abstract: JPMorgan Chase has hired Marc Granetz, a senior banker at Credit Suisse, to spearhead an internal push to improve the firm’s own financial strength and strategy.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has hired Marc Granetz, a senior banker at Credit Suisse, to spearhead an internal push to improve the firm’s own financial strength and strategy.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Marc Granetz, until last month a senior banking executive at Credit Suisse, to spearhead an internal push to improve the firm’s own financial strength and strategy, the bank announced in an internal memorandum on Friday.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Credit Suisse’s Granetz to Lead Finance Initiative

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
